title: Conduct Project Post-Mortem
description: An implementation project has just completed, and the project manager needs to conduct a post-mortem to identify lessons learned.

tasks.description: Schedule a post-mortem meeting with the internal project team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager gets the meeting on the calendar.

tasks.description: Lead the meeting, discussing what went well, what didn't go well, and what could be improved for future projects.
tasks.expected_outcome: The team openly discusses the project and identifies key lessons learned.

tasks.description: Document the lessons learned and add them to the team's knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Project manager documents the findings to improve future processes.
